product_name: YayLabs! Ice Cream Ball Inflatable Cover - Pint
long_description: Add this inflatable cover to your Yaylabs! ice cream ball (sold separately) for insulation and cushioned fun as you shake it, pass it, or roll it around to make a tasty treat. Phthalate-free plastic cover features 2 air valves for easy inflation and deflation; rip-and-stick tabs on the sides allow secure closure. Kids can have fun building their own ice cream monster on the inflatable cover with the included reusable stickers.
short_description: Add this inflatable cover to your Yaylabs! ice cream ball (sold separately) for insulation and cushioned fun as you shake it, pass it, or roll it around to make a tasty treat.
